# Overview

This script process landscape/patch statistics by class burned/unburned **For Each patch** for the 2020 fires in Northeastern Siberia. Fires are processed individually.


[Landscapemetrics package details](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/landscapemetrics/landscapemetrics.pdf)



# 20

## Clear workspace
```{r}
rm(list=ls()) 
```

## Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2001Binary/2001BinaryImg_20.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2001") %>%
  filter(IDobj==20)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 20) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2001patchFire_20.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```


## Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2001Binary/2001BinaryImg_1234.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2001") %>%
  filter(IDobj==1234)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 1234) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2001patchFire_1234.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```


```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%

```

```{r}
rm(list=ls()) 
```

## Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2001Binary/2001BinaryImg_1955.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2001") %>%
  filter(IDobj==1955)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 1955) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2001patchFire_1955.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```



```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2001") %>%
```

```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```
